ğŸš export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš export CFLAGS=-I/opt/include 
ğŸš export LDFLAGS=-L/opt/lib 
ğŸš mktemp -d
ğŸš cd
ğŸš curl -fsSLO https://www.gnupg.org/ftp/gcrypt/libksba/libksba-1.6.5.tar.bz2
ğŸš echo a564628c574c99287998753f98d750babd91a4e9db451f46ad140466ef2a6d16  libksba-1.6.5.tar.bz2
ğŸš tee SHA256SUM
ğŸš cat SHA256SUM
ğŸš shasum -c SHA256SUM
ğŸš rm SHA256SUM
ğŸš tar -xf libksba-1.6.5.tar.bz2
ğŸš cd libksba-1.6.5
ğŸš ./configure --prefix=/opt/package/libksba-1.6.5
ğŸš make -j8
ğŸš sudo make install
ğŸš rm -rf
